text: The 1969/70 NTFL season was the 49th season of the Northern Territory Football League (NTFL). Darwin have won there 17th premiership title while defeating St Marys in the grand final by 13 points. ==Grand Final== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align:left;" |- style="background:#efefef;" ! Premiers ! GF Score ! Runner-up |- | Darwin | 12.13 (85) - 11.6 (72) | St Marys |} == References == Category:Northern Territory Football League seasons NTFL
title: 1969/70 NTFL season
